cause.description:
Fady el Khatib is the best player in Lebanon ..due to the years he spent at 7ekmeh...He never wanted to leave the team but when the team felt a part, offcourse our national team captain will leave to remain playing in the first division after threats of 7ekmeh going down to D2. He should come back to play in a well organized 7ekmeh team next season with Joe Ghattas, Alvin Sims and Goerges Ke3di.
1. Make 7ekmeh the best team in Asia again
2. Fady is a true leader with Mchantaf as Manager
cause.mission: Show everybody how 7ekmeh fans loves their son Fady el Khatib
cause.name: Lets Bring Fady el Khatib Back to 7ekmeh
